page.title: 14G.C.H.Q.
page.content: IN THE MIDDLE OF OUR AREA IS THE {GOVERNMENT COMMUNICATIONS HEADQUARTERS {(G.C.H.Q.)}WHICH IS A DEPARTMENT OF {THE FOREIGN OFFICE.}THIS IS ONE OF TWO LARGE ESTABLISHMENTS IN THE TOWN AND TOGETHER EMPLOY A LARGE NUMBER OF PEOPLE.{SECURITY}IS{VERY STRICT}AND NO-ONE IS ALLOWED IN WITHOUT A PASS. ON 27TH JUNE, FOUR CHILDREN FROM HOLY TRINITY SCHOOL WERE SHOWN AROUND PART OF THE BASE. IN 1984, THE GOVERNMENT {BANNED}THE STAFF FROM BELONGING TO A {TRADE UNION}BECAUSE THEY THOUGHT THIS TO BE A SECURITY RISK. THE UNIONS ARE STILL FIGHTING IN THE COURTS TO CHANGE THIS. ABOUT THREE YEARS AGO, ONE OF THE STAFF WAS FOUND GUILTY OF{SPYING {FOR RUSSIA}AND IS NOW IN LONG LARTIN PRISON NEAR EVESHAM. THE BASE IS SURROUNDED BY SECURITY DEVICES BECAUSE OF THE IMPORTANCE TO THE COUNTRY'S SECURITY OF THE WORK DONE THERE.
